discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Answer is B
As per Module 01 Page 6 of CTIA Courseware

questions.question_text: In which of the following attacks does the attacker exploit vulnerabilities in a computer application before the software developer can release a patch for them?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer is D
As per Module 03 Page 210 of CTIA Courseware

choices.B: Look for an individual within the organization

questions.question_text:
H&P, Inc. is a small-scale organization that has decided to outsource the network security monitoring due to lack of resources in the organization. They are looking for the options where they can directly incorporate threat intelligence into their existing network defense solutions.
Which of the following is the most cost-effective methods the organization can employ?

Henry. a threat intelligence analyst at ABC Inc., is working on a threat intelligence program. He was assigned to work on establishing criteria for prioritization of intelligence needs and requirements.
Which of the following considerations must be employed by Henry to prioritize intelligence requirements?

choices.A: Understand frequency and impact of a threat

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Answer is A
As per Module 04 Page 260 of CTIA Courseware

questions.question_text:
Tim is working as an analyst in an ABC organization. His organization had been facing many challenges in converting the raw threat intelligence data into meaningful contextual information. After inspection, he found that it was due to noise obtained from misrepresentation of data from huge data collections. Hence, it is important to clean the data before performing data analysis using techniques such as data reduction. He needs to choose an appropriate threat intelligence framework that automatically performs data collection, filtering, and analysis for his organization.
Which of the following threat intelligence frameworks should he choose to perform such task?

discussion.content: In someway this question is incorrect because the correct answers sholud be COLLECTIVE INTELLIGENCE FRAMEWORK (CIF) threat intelligence framework that automatically performs data collection, filtering, and analysis. but if not the only one available is TC Complete, so answer is D

Selected Answer: C
Answer is C
As per Module 05 Page 420 of CTIA Courseware

questions.question_text:
A team of threat intelligence analysts is performing threat analysis on malware, and each of them has come up with their own theory and evidence to support their theory on a given malware.
Now, to identify the most consistent theory out of all the theories, which of the following analytic processes must threat intelligence manager use?
